TextView.android:text: Sub Items is a featured used to add things related to your bucket list item. For example; Say one of my Bucketlist items is that I want to visit Toronto. There is also many things I would like to do in Toronto besides just 'visit.' I could add sub items like 'Visit the CN Tower', 'Go to the Hockey Hall of Fame.' Once the sub items are added it will create a list of the sub items with check boxes associated to them.
